sub_title: Business Development | Commercial Strategy | Sales Growth | Customer Success
summary:
To pursue a challenging position as a senior business leader to contribute the intense experience, execution expertise, knowledge & analytical acumen to benefit the organization while ensuring personal progression & career empowerment. 

Growth, continuous improvement, digital, analytics, performance measure and incremental results!
•	Proven experience leading successful customer engagement and success stories. Worked with global customers to transform their customers experience strategies for faster go to market with higher efficiencies on customer collaborations. 
•	Successfully executed global strategic initiative to provide platforms that are industry focused and success driven enabling interactions and engagement with customer through digital channels
•	Product owner for salesforce.com for sales designing and driving growth strategy with leaders and decision makers across different work streams and geographies to scale up sales outreach and efficiencies on pipeline conversion. 
•	Consulting and thought leadership skills for business, industry trends and digital (focused on customers’ Business needs, Execution plan and Future State Strategies, deliver and Execute complex business value propositions based on feasibility study, research and customer expectations)
•	Strong understanding of how the customer experience translates into value for customers, value for the business and how it is best delivered by technology and digital channels.
•	Immense experience (led 7000+ hours and $10 million) of managing large scale projects (waterfall and ‘wagile’) with global stakeholders’, large budget & project schedule and change management knowledge. 
•	Multi-cultural and cross functional exposure with business and technology teams gained while working on successful customer engagements across Asia Pacific, Europe, Brazil and the U.S.
•	Lead performance measures for outstanding scores, received customer recognition awards and well known as a trusted partner for customers and organization
•	As a pro-catalyst towards people and process transformation, managed and deployed customer and business focused operations model as a part of developing an organization wide initiative of increasing the operating advantage
•	Introduced significant process and working model upgrades by leading and facilitating multiple Kaizen events for the organization

awards.title: Achievements
awards.description:
	Youngest Manager/Regional leader within the country/region

	Won first prize for Nestle case study event IIM-A Confluence 2010 winning over teams from IIM A, IIM B and SP Jain 
	Selected in top 10 in BPlan event at IIM-A Confluence 2010 
	Won first prize for white paper presentation on “Next Generation Networks & Information Security“ at HL commerce college, Ahmedabad 

	Achieved 2nd position at national level quiz event - DWIANKI 2007 M.S. University 
	Stood among top 5 at national level leadership hunt - TYCOONS 2008 M.S. University

projects.title: New Design Request Process Revamp
projects.description:
Large and complex process revamp to advance sales strategy for a new initiative for channel distribution with scope traversing through ecommerce, ERP, pricing tools and CRM solution.

Results: Managed a team of 14 across 5 cross functions, and delivered the new process in a compressed timeline of 8 weeks with a potential to add opportunities averaging to a few million every quarter.

projects.description:

projects.title: TE.com for Brazil
projects.description:
• Business Benefits: Rolled out TE.com and the ecommerce platform to Brazil customer’s thus providing a robust solution to more than 2000 customers and self service capabilities that meets the country’s legal requirements. 
• Responsibilities: Managed the project with business and cross functional team as stakeholders, also engaged a vendor for the experience design. Delivered a customer experience and application portfolio 
• Results: Received an ‘Extraordinary customer experience’ award for managing a complex roll out from Brazil. Delivered the expected solution changes and the transitions/handover expected by the Brazil. This roll out will directly drive the revenue earnings.

projects.title: Fast Track Ordering on TE.com
projects.description:
Key Objective: A fairly complex fast track ordering application for Europe in a Business to Business model with a thorough integration with ERP, Pricing, Finance, Taxation & ecommerce module to allow users place orders fr fast track delivery in 5 days.
Business Benefit: This automation will enable the company to expand the customer base, increase sales channels and connect directly to end users to improve marketing efforts and gain new competitive advantages. Also, adopt new business models by taking advantages of the market place opportunities, serve new markets and customers types, manage an extended ecosystem for the customers
Responsibilities: Managed a project team of 6 and coordinated with 4 other cross team spread across the globe and executing this project to its successful completion to meet a non-negotiable timeline and budgetary parameters by implementing Agile to minimize scope changes. Focused on the specificities for the requirement suiting the European business model and pricing conditions. Contributing to this as a project manager from a concept of creating a fast track ordering application to the solution with involvement in requirement gathering, budgeting, designing, testing, user acceptance, stakeholder management, scope change management and cross team management & coordination.

projects.title: Internet Ship and Debit on TE.com
projects.description:

• Business Benefits: Channel partners and distributors can submit claims, verify agreements and download claim reports through the application. 
• Responsibilities: Managed a project team of 5 and coordinated with 3 other cross team spread across the globe and executed this project to its successful completion to meet a non-negotiable timeline and budgetary parameters by implementing Agile to minimize scope changes. Focused on delivering an end to end solution and contributed to all project related activities including managing stakeholder relations, ensuring team's vision of the solution and goal for the project, requirement gathering, planning strategy, design of functional solution, documentation of functional specifications, mock design of the actual screen flows and navigation from user experience perspective, project budgeting and planning, Implementation planning and global roll-out planning,Testing and solution Delivery.

This study revolves around this concern as to how much return would a project would give to its sponsors

The project has been financially appraised using techniques like IRR, NPV and Payback period
